response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its value to you, we believe it would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. We're offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This represents a great opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a price that is more favorable than what others might pay. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. We look forward to serving you.", "product_price": 12000}
